Windlord:

"Aerotaur, look out!!!"warned Windlord "I don't like other 
Funeral..."


--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, Rudra656@a... wrote:
> ::Aerotaur::
>        He takes the shots from Carnatron in the chest, arms, and 
wings 
> wincing with every hit.  It forces him back a step and he grimaces 
but spares 
> a glance over his shoulder at Nightlight who he sees is 
unconscious.  
> "Flicker, you can end this right now.  Tell him to cease fire and 
I'll take 
> Nightlight home.  You've already got what you wanted, you're home 
free.  You 
> don't need her anymore."
